author: Luciana Magalhes
title: For Sale: Apartment Once Owned by Former Brazilian President Convicted of Bribery
text:
GUARUJÁ, Brazil—Apartment 164-A in the beachfront Solaris building here is an underwhelming property with an overwhelming role in Brazil’s modern political history.
The four-bedroom apartment was given to former Brazilian President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva by a construction company in exchange for his help winning contracts with state oil company Petrobras, according to evidence presented to a court that convicted Mr. da Silva on bribery charges last year.
...
